column1: :While in the book Fíli and Kíli are said to be the youngest of the 13 Dwarves in Thorins company by at least 50 years
column2: Ori is instead the youngest in the Hobbit films.

column1: :No actor is specified for the role of Ori.
:Ori is omitted; Thorin is the only companion of the player
:No actor is credited for the role of Ori.
2007: The Lord of the Rings Online:

:There are two dwarves that have the name Ori. Foreman Ori stands near the Silver Deep Mine in Thorins Gate. There is also a Captain Ori that the player controls during a session play entitled "We Cannot Get Out".http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pyIFrUbkYAE LOTRO - We Cant Get Out Session play instance (video) at http://www.youtube.com/ YouTube.com (accessed 27 May 2011) Since the events of the game happen after  and the session play is a flashback of the fight in the Twenty-First Hall that happened during
column2: Foreman Ori must be a character created specifically for the game
column3: while Captain Ori is Turbines adaptation of the Ori described in Tolkiens writings.
